doc.name: paused

syntax.example: set the paused of player to {true | false}

doc.summary: Specifies whether a sound or movie is paused.

examples.example: set the paused of player "Oops!" to true -- pause the movie

description.p: Use the paused property to pause or resume a movie or sound, or to check whether the user has done so.
The paused of a player is true or false.
When a player is not playing, its paused reports true.
